title: This Week's Top Stories - Vaccination Nation, William Shatner's Space Trip & The Great Resignation
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Vaccination Nation, William Shatner's Space Trip & The Great Resignation
description:
Texas Governor Greg Abbott orders a sweeping ban on COVID-19 vaccine mandates, William Shatner goes to space, and a record-breaking number of Americans quit their jobs.
